description.value:
The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d4 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d4 type=poison average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The myconid targets one corpse of a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} or a Large or smaller &Reference[beast]{beast} within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant. The corpse stays animated for 1d4 + 1 weeks or until destroyed, and it canâ€™t be animated again in this way.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. The &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} target is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} while it hallucinates. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned]{stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

A 30-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an &Reference[int]{Intelligence} of 2 or higher that arenâ€™t &Reference[undead]{undead}, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Distress Spores. When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Sun Sickness. While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
